title: The Witch's Revenge
description: The Salem Witch Trials are the single most notorious example of mob mentality in American History. Bubble's, a spoiled feline, "Not Cat, that word has always offended me." faces the repercussions of those bloody days in modern Salem. His family has just moved into the ancestral home of one of the poor soul's convicted of witchcraft. With the help of Bubble's two new friends, Nigel Jameson III and Mrs. Perry Winkle, he must sort out the strange phenomenon plaguing his home and family, while also avoiding The Witch's Revenge.
author: Casey J. Oliver
